Uses of Interface
org.jooby.LifeCycle

  • Packages that use LifeCycle 
    Package Description
    org.jooby
    do more, more easily

    • Uses of LifeCycle in org.jooby

      Subinterfaces of LifeCycle in org.jooby 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Env
      Allows to optimize, customize or apply defaults values for application services.
      Classes in org.jooby that implement LifeCycle 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Jooby
      jooby
      Methods in org.jooby that return LifeCycle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default LifeCycle LifeCycle.lifeCycle(Class<?> service)
      Add to lifecycle the given service.
      LifeCycle LifeCycle.onStart(org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Consumer<Registry> task)
      Add a start lifecycle event, useful for initialize and/or start services at startup time.
      default LifeCycle LifeCycle.onStart(org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Runnable task)
      Add a start lifecycle event, useful for initialize and/or start services at startup time.
      LifeCycle LifeCycle.onStarted(org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Consumer<Registry> task)
      Add a started lifecycle event.
      default LifeCycle LifeCycle.onStarted(org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Runnable task)
      Add a started lifecycle event.
      LifeCycle LifeCycle.onStop(org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Consumer<Registry> task)
      Add a stop lifecycle event, useful for cleanup and/or stop service at stop time.
      default LifeCycle LifeCycle.onStop(org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Runnable task)
      Add a stop lifecycle event, useful for cleanup and/or stop service at stop time.
